channel.title: [HELP]Server Glitch?
channel.description:
ok after a while the drops stop working... any clue how to make it so the drops always work??
i leave me computer on overnight and when i get on ppl msg me "TURN DROPS ON!"
so i usualy just restart server and they work again
any ideas how 2 make them not turn off? :\
ppl said 2 fix it n idk how 2 so im asking, help wuld be apreciated ;) rep++
